title: ‚úÖ Basic Cube
description: Basic cube with orbit controls, react-three-fiber and leva controls.

title: ‚úÖ Physics Cube
description: Basic cube applied with physics from the cannon package.

title: ‚úÖ Physics Experiment
description: Little physics experiment using Cannon, animations and textures.

title: ‚úÖ Imported 3D Object
description: An imported model of a realistic brain mesh with materials and textures.

title: ‚úÖ Imported Animation
description: A scene with an imported and converted FBX model that includes textures and animations.

title: ‚úÖ  FPV Example
description: A simple scene where you can walk around and jump on boxes with default FPV controls.

title: ‚úÖ Ambient Sound Stereo
description: A simple demo with an embedded stereo ambient sound file.

title: ‚úÖ Ambient 8 Channel MP3
description: A simple demo with a tweakable 8 channel MP3 ambient sound.

title: ‚úÖ Ambient 8 Channel Wav
description: A simple demo with a tweakable 8 channel wav ambient sound.

title: ‚úÖ Dynamic Scene Loading
description: Click on the cube and you will land in a new dynamically-loaded scene.

title: ‚úÖ Unreal Engine Scene
description: Imported Unreal Engine GLTF scene with no textures and no lights.

title: ‚ùå Maya GLTF Without Draco
description: Imported GLTF scene from Maya converted via gltfjsx, with textures and no Draco.

title: üîÑ Maya GLTF With Draco
description: Imported GLTF scene from Maya converted via gltfjsx, with textures and Draco.

title: ‚ùå Non-Convex Mesh Collider
description: A block-in scene to demonstrate non-convex mesh colliders with FPV.

title: ‚ùå Lightmap Scene
description: A block-in scene to demonstrate pre-baked lightmaps, UVs and texture compressions/optimisations.

title: ‚ùå Forest & Tamina Block-Ins
description: Both block-in scenes, optimised, with audio, and FPV controls and dynamic scene loading.

title: ‚ùå WebXR Controls
description: Both block-in scenes as before but with optional/opt-in virtual reality/WebXR controls.

title: ‚ùå Dynamic Audio Placement
description: A scene dedicated for the audio engineers to manually place sound objects in the scene.
